Row.Text: Well met, fellow warrior. May we be allies in this turbulent world.
I the Queen of the Iceni, chosen of Prasutagus. In me lives the will of my people and the soul of a King. What makes you think you are worthy?
I offer my friendship and with it the potential to forge an alliance in the future. What is your answer?
Thank-you! Accept this torc as a symbol of our new friendship!
It's a pity; potentially we could have been allies in war.
Our chariots are ready and the torches burn bright. My daughters shall know the taste of your blood!
You dare?! Have you forgotten the price paid by Londinium? Your streets will ring with the battle cries of my people.
You may have won our land and wealth, but my people are a proud one. Our legacy will live on, and be hard forgotten.
Vile ruler, know you have won this war in name alone. Your cities lie buried and your troops defeated. I have my own victory.
I received the gifts from your trade delegation. I will remember your kindness.
Maybe some other time?
My diplomatic delegation brings you a small gift of potteryware from Venta Icenorum. Welcome them as you would welcome me.
Pray you do not anger me any further - my hounds have not hunted in quite some time.
You are a pauper. The world will know the truth!Â (Denounces You)
Be it known that you are now in the land of the Iceni. I am Boudicca, their chosen Queen. Do not underestimate me.
We have an city nearby. Would you like to visit? I'd like to introduce you to our craftsmen.
Continue, before I change my mind.
Venta Icenorum is my home; the Iceni have lived there for generations. I can tell you more if you tell me of your capital.
You wish to speak with me?
I am only interested in people who realise the importance of a large military. You are obviously one of them.
(You have a large standing army.)
What treachery is this? By Andraste's might, the lamentation of your defeated peoples will be a sweet lullaby to my daughters' ears.
(You have declared a surprise war on Boucicca or attacked her home continent.)
I choose my allies carefully, and I have found you worthy.
Let us join our forces together and reap the rewards. What is your answer?
What makes you think you are worthy to reject a deal from me?
I must admit, I would much rather be at peace with you.
Do you take me for a simpleton? Leave this place.
As much as I wish for your destruction, I believe we can set aside our differences for a small amount of time. Do you agree?
You may pass into Iceni lands, provided you respect our ancient heritage.
Did you think I would not notice your army at my borders? I would suggest you move them.
Boudicca hates attacks on civs based on her continent.
Boudicca dislikes people who declare surprise wars.
